name: Salade de Tomate et Oignon (Tomato and Onion Salad)
recipeCategory: dinner, easy, quick, salads and dressings
recipeIngredient: 1/8 teaspoon dried hot red pepper flakes

recipeInstructions.text: Core the tomatoes but do not peel them. Cut the tomatoes into half-inch-thick slices. Stack the slices and cut them into 1/2-inchthick strips. Cut the strips into 1/2-inch-thick cubes.
Put the tomatoes in a salad or mixing bowl and add the remaining ingredients. Blend thoroughly. Serve chilled or at room temperature.
